section.title: domain_suffix (string)
section.para: The domain suffix to be added to the domain name obtained from the digits of an E164 number. Can be overridden by a parameter to enum_query.

section.title: tel_uri_params (string)
section.para: A string whose contents is appended to each new tel URI in the request as tel URI parameters.

note.para: Currently SER does not support tel URIs. This means that at present tel_uri_params is appended as URI parameters to every URI.
